data.title: [The Mystic Nine Special] 105 Secrets about Fo Ye and Er Ye
data.meta_description: Hehe, because I love everyone so much and you guys are wonderful during this whole TMN recap season, here is one hell of a fun fangirling post <3 My awesome friend who started watching this show sent me links about facts to know about Fo Ye and Er Ye. These facts are from the novelâ€¦
data.text:
Hehe, because I love everyone so much and you guys are wonderful during this whole TMN recap season, here is one hell of a fun fangirling post â¤ My awesome friend who started watching this show sent me links about facts to know about Fo Ye and Er Ye. These facts are from the novel so we wonâ€™t get too much OTP information. BUT, we get bromance information and let me tell you, it is quiet cheesy ðŸ˜‰

This is a post for everyone wanting to know more about the book. Do realize the drama may deviate from the novel, but it is also possible this list will be spoilers full. Be ready! Here is the link of the official website for even more information about the book series. Haha, as I read all this, I realize how strong the Fo Ye + Er Ye romance is, I feel bad for Ya Tou xD There are SO many details we are missing in the drama.

50 Facts about Fo Ye (Zhang Qishan) Source link

Fo Ye loves his wife very much.

Fo Ye never knew he has a brother.

Fo Ye is younger than his brother, Zhang Qiling

If not from the family documents/achives, Fo Ye would know about nobody in his family tree except his father.

BIG SPOILER!! The most precious object for Fo Ye is his wife funerary.. (WTF, please tell me this is only the ending for the novel)

Fo Ye will grow old.

Finally, Fo Ye was not able to assemble the ä¸‰è¿žå“ aka Triple Ring (?)

Fo Ye himself cannot explain how the Buddha statue got inside his house.

SPOILER!!! Nobody knows where Fo Yeâ€™s wifeâ€™s tomb is (buried somewhere in the mountains), but he put all the treasures he received at the auction when they met inside her tomb.

Fo Ye is not â€œthe largest-ever down fightFffffing activitiesâ€ leader.

Fo Ye is â€œthe largest-ever down fighting activitiesâ€â€˜s initiator.

Fo Ye has a very good memory

Fo Ye has no inheritor.

Everyone in Fo Yeâ€™s household has the Zhang surname.

Fo Yeâ€™s intuition is very accurate.

Fo Ye brings his own fire arms when going inside the tomb/cave.

The Zhang family still holds their old traditions.

Fo Yeâ€™s fingers are not long.

Fo Ye is a careful man and follows the steps he thought of accurately.

Fo Ye has obsessive compulsive disorder.

Fo Ye is the most low-key member of the Mystic Nine except Ba Ye (lol, did they mistype this because the drama shows such a different image).

Fo Ye can use any means to get to his end.

Fo Ye never goes to fireworks place as he hates it.

Fo Yeâ€™s taste budes are very tricky, but he is not a picky eater.

Fo Ye is loyal.

Fo Ye loves dogs.

Fo Ye found 369 Zhang Qiling (his brotherâ€™s name) before finding the owner.

Fo Yeâ€™s mother is from Changsha.

Fo Ye hates indecisive people as they cannot accomplish big things.

Fo Ye never own others and if other do to him, he will always get it back.

Fo Ye is obsessed with work.

Except work, Fo Ye has no passion.

Fo Ye hates defective things.

Fo Ye doesnâ€™t smoke.

After the sino-Japanese war, Fo Ye wasnâ€™t specifically happy.

Fo Yeâ€™s favorite thing to do is drink with Ba Ye.

Fo Ye doesnâ€™t discriminate when tomb raiding.

Fo Ye is actually not the best at tomb raiding inside the Mystic Nine family.

Fo Ye actually respects Zhang Qiling a lot.

Fo Ye doesnâ€™t like to listen to Chinese Opera (Ha! He went to Er Yeâ€™sâ€¦)

Fo Ye canâ€™t sing.

Fo Ye collects old archaeology manuscripts.

Fo Ye did many good and bad deeds for others. So much he canâ€™t even count them.

Fo Ye still has guilt for Er Ye.

Fo Ye puts importance on name value and reputation.

Fo Ye has a real man mentality.

Fo Ye has one revolver he keeps in mint state.

Fo Ye is raising a horse.

Since joining the army, Fo Ye wears most of the time a military uniform.

Fo Yeâ€™s whole life was spend to fight in wars and find the secret to immortality.

55 Facts about Er Ye (Er Yue Hong) Source link

Er Ye has a pretty real name. But because nobody uses it, it was forgotten.

Er Ye cannot different genders easily.

Er Ye loves to sing Opera, but he doesnâ€™t like make-up and dressing up because it is complicated.

Er Yeâ€™s favorite way of singing is when doing it into someoneâ€™s ears.

The first time Er Ye met Fo Ye, he decided he will marry him when he will be older.

Er Ye hates tobacco smells.

The first Yang Chun Noodles Er Ye ate was made by Fo Ye.

Er Ye is scared of any object that is supernatural.

Er Ye doesnâ€™t like women with white white skin because that reminds him of ghost.

Er Ye likes äºŒäººè½¬ (2 people opera) more than èŠ±é¼“æˆ (flower drum opera).

Er Ye is fascinated by military uniforms.

Er Ye always looked at Ya Tou like she was his younger sister.

Er Ye married to Ya Tou because of his dadâ€™s wishes.

Before his wedding, Er Ye got into a fight with Fo Ye and even got slapped.

Because of this, Er Ye swore that if he ever talked to Fo Ye again, he would forever be dominated by him.

At the wedding night, Er Ye considered running away/get cold feet.

Er Yeâ€™s father put aphrodisiac in his drink because he wanted to become a grandpa.

When singing opera to Ya Tou, Er Ye thinks of Fo Ye.

Er Ye once considered to disguise as a girl to marry Fo Ye.

Er Ye did not give names to his two children.

After Ya Touâ€™s death, Er Ye HATES Fo Ye.

Er Ye deciding to play around at the brothel was to anger Fo Ye (ooohhh .o.)

Each of Er Yeâ€™s lover has a characteristic similar to Fo Ye.

Er Ye first forgives Fo Ye and then they started fighting.

When Er Ye first met the girl from the Huo family, he got goose bumps.

Because he is really pretty, Er Ye push away the perverts by first mentionning Fo Yeâ€™s name or two, telling a cold joke.

Very few people genuinely laugh to Er Yeâ€™s cold jokes.

The reason Er Ye accepted Chen Pi as his disciple was because â€¦ Chen Pi laughed at one of his cold joke, a joke even Fo Ye didnâ€™t laugh at. (HAHAHAHHAHAHAHA, oh that is funny :â€™D )

Because Jie Jiu (Jiu Ye?) made fun of Er Yeâ€™s name Er Yue Hong, Er Ye came up with the name â€œRedâ€ and â€œFlowerâ€ for his disciples.

Er Ye loves to sleep warm, so he likes to sleep with Fo Yeâ€™s embrace.. â¤

Er Ye prefers the name â€œHong Erâ€ (çº¢å„¿) to the name â€œEr Yeâ€, but he only lets Fo Ye calls him like that.

Without anyone around, Er Ye likes to call Fo Ye â€œQi Shanâ€.

When Er Ye calls out Fo Ye, he always imagine in his mind the image of a girl who loves pearls. Even if he never met such a girl before.

Er Ye is uncomfortable with anything related to blood and that is why he uses a stick.

Er Ye always feel guilty when he faces Fo Yeâ€™s wife.

Er Ye feels more sorry than jealous of Fo Yeâ€™s wife.

Er Ye never considered the offensive approach.

Er Ye loves dogs, but is too lazy to raise one.

The food Er Ye hates the most is dog meat.

Er Ye always wanted to find a wife for San Cunding.

Er Ye is great at Wei Qi, but bad at Xiang Qi (Chinese chesses).

Er Ye has a really pretty handwriting.

Er Yeâ€™s drawing skills are child level (except when it comes to make up~)

Er Ye is a very economic person (saves money).

Er Ye cooked the four eggs Chen Pi broke to make a meal for Fo Ye.

By taking care of Ya Touâ€™s health, Er Ye is half way through of becoming a doctor.

Er Ye is really easy to imitate.

Er Ye also considered to force Jie Jiu to learn opera.

Er Ye first wanted to call Jie Jiu, Jiu Jie Yu Hua.

Er Ye doesnâ€™t like Zhang Qiling because he is too white and cannot be tanned. (Er Ye: Is he a ghost?)

Er Ye always thought that Zhang Qiling is Ms.Huoâ€™s long lost brother.

When going to the same event as Zhang Qiling, Er Ye would always wear extra layers of clothing.

Er Yeâ€™s sixth sense is really strong.

At Wu Xieâ€™s banquet, Er Ye felt like they are both very alike.

Er Ye thinks that the full moon looks evil.
